features: Breathable & Soft & Comfortable – BLScode masks with the inner skin-friendly non-woven fabric is as soft as intimate clothing, light and breathable without stimulation.

a filtering layer, say bye to particles from 0.3 to 1.0 pm. Inner layer is a water absorbing layer, which can absorb the moisture from the breath of the wearer, avoid the filtering layer from getting wet.

Easy to Use – Our protective covers are disposable and single use. Lightweight provides comfort and easy breathing while you’re at work, grocery store, or running necessary errands. Just slip the elastic bands over your ears and conform metal nose guard to create a light seal around your face. Should not be reusable. Apply new one every 12 - 24 hours for best protection to ensure moisture from breathe doesn’t dampen it.

Universal Elastic Style Ear Hooks– Soft, comfortable ear bands prevent headaches when wearing for long periods of time and allow for easy modifications when fitting to both adults and small children. Convenient one size fits all styling safeguards everyone—perfect for families, office & warehouse workers & more.

100% Satisfaction - If for any reason you are unhappy with our product, please do not hesitate to contact us. We take full ownership and responsibility for the quality of our products and will do our best to solve your problem quickly and efficiently!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great company, great product and made in America

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Brand is CP Shield. Yes, they are 4-ply.
reviews.reviewText: This review is for Made In USA ASTM Level 3 Face Mask 4 ply Disposable Masks Facial Cover, Elastic Ear Loops, For Adults & Kids (Box of 50). That's how it is listed on Amazon.Now that the box is here (arrived timely and in good order), I see the brand is CP Shield. Two stickers on the box indicate it is ASTM Level 3, but the box itself does not so indicate. I could not find the Owner/operator number on the Internet. Hmmn. Anyway, the box was sealed with a sticker, and the masks themselves were in a plastic bag. I like this as it keeps dust out. Other boxes of masks I have open like a box of facial tissue. This box does not. It's a tad less convenient, but again it helps keep dust out. I'm pleased with the packaging.The listing strongly implies the masks are sterile -- see fourth photo in the product listing -- but the box says they are NOT. However, they do seems very clean. Perhaps they are not sterile in the medical sense.I wore one today for several hours. It was so easy to breathe, I got suspicious and cut one in half when I got home. Yes, indeed, there are four layers -- thin layers. Does it filter as well as described on Amazon? Well, I guess we have to take them at their word. The 3 ply Chinese masks I have seem thicker.Nose piece is fine. Ear loops are more comfortable than other masks I have tried. I see mixed reviews about the ear loops. The size of your face and location of your ears may determine your comfort level. I have a smaller head; larger persons may have to add an ear saver to their order.The box says replace the mask every four hours. I have never seen this on any other box of masks.I got these during the Christmas sale. They cost me about $1 more than fifty 3 ply Chinese masks. Today's price seems comparable to other four ply masks on Amazon., but of course not as cheap as 3 ply masks.I'd buy again at the next sale.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Made in the USA
reviews.reviewText: Made in the USA. I look for American made products as I trust the quality of the product. Unfortunately we are back to wearing masks. Very high rates in NJ aor Flu,RSV, and Penumonia

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The masks are great but, they are a little big on my face. I am a petite female.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good masks, and supporting US made products.
reviews.reviewText: These are well built. Bought my original masks from Costco, they were good. Bought more on Amazon from China and you could tell the thinner cheap quality. They made them just to produce them, not to be effective.These are better quality for sure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like the way they fit. If you open the accordion and pull it below the chin, they don’t ride up into the eyes. When you squeeze the nosepiece, my glasses don’t fog up. The four ply is protective and still easy to breathe. There is no scent to them. I will buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very nice, but too large.
reviews.reviewText: I love that these masks are made in the USA, but they are to large for my face even when I twist the elastic around my ears twice. The protection isn't good for me because of the previous statement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: softer fabric -Less paper feeling. Didn’t have issues with fibers coming loose as the day went on like other masks have done
